}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "LO00066 REV:1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The device has a MAC label affixed to the back of the card w/ a 00:1A:EF ('''[[Loopcomm]]''') OUI. It is expected to be used with production models.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
